alert.note: Alert for Coconino Plateau; Grand Canyon Country; Little Colorado River Valley in Coconino County; Oak Creek and Sycamore Canyons; Yavapai County Mountains (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 23 at 10:12AM MST until February 23 at 6:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM MST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Snow. Additional snow accumulations of up to 4 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...Areas near Grand Canyon, North Rim, Prescott, Prescott Valley, Sedona, Seligman, Tuba City and Valle. * WHEN...Until 6 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. Additional snow forecast from 9 AM Today to 6 PM Today: Grand Canyon 1 to 2 inches North Rim 1 to 2 inches Prescott 2 to 4 inches Prescott Valley 1 to 3 inches Sedona 1 to 3 inches Seligman 1 to 2 inches Tuba City 0 to 1 inches Valle 1 to 3 inches .
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.

area.areaDesc: Coconino Plateau; Grand Canyon Country; Little Colorado River Valley in Coconino County; Oak Creek and Sycamore Canyons; Yavapai County Mountains
